item.description:
Openings, Special Events & Live Entertainment (5:00-9:00pm)

Agolaccio: A Gallery – Grand Opening Celebration!

The Austin Street Inn and “The Annex” – Ribbon Cutting and Reception, Columbia Action CT Benefit Exhibition

DaSilva Gallery – Opening Reception: Paintings by Jacob Pongratz

Jennifer Jane Gallery – 8 Eyes: photographs by four extraordinary painters

Kehler Liddell Gallery – Artist Reception: Here and There: Photos by Matt Garrett and Paintings by Gigi Liverant

Lyric Hall Antiques & Conservation – People, Places, Music (9-10pm), DJ & dancing follows

Neville's Fashion Design Studio – Reception & Open Studio

Odeon Boutique – Window on the World of Fashion: 1960 – 2010 – If Clothes Could Talk

Rodrick Gilchrist Design – Open House & Reception

Soho Hair Group & Day Spa – "Special Effects" featuring live hair models as Window Dressing

Westside Bar & Grille – Live Music - PuRpLE MouNTaiN (6-10pm)

Westville Wines – Wine Tasting: Sparkling Wines (5:00-8:30)

Wintergreen of Westville – Live Music & Refreshments on the Patio: Unkle Shoe (5:00-7:00pm)

Wunderlee Arts – [P3] Paintings, Prints, & Photographs; Don Wunderlee, Oi Fortin, and Catherine Fisher



FREE CRAFT
Lets Meet at Liddell Gallery Gallery at 6pm
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a leopard print scarf

item.name: New Haven "Westville" ART WALK
